headline: A Look at Molson Coors (TAP) Valuation Following Upcoming CCO Departure and Leadership Change
summary: Molson Coors Beverage (NYSE:TAP) is making a key change in its executive team, announcing that Chief Commercial Officer Michelle St. Jacques will depart on November 14, 2025. The company plans to share more about its transition process soon. See our latest analysis for Molson Coors Beverage. Shares of Molson Coors Beverage have faced some turbulence lately, with a year-to-date share price return of -19.3% and a 1-year total shareholder return of -11.5%. Recent leadership changes and shifting...
